title: Peptide Library Check pipeline parameters
description: Check if peptides from experimental data are present in a FASTA library by generating tryptic peptides with configurable miss cleavages

plugin_parameters.title: Plugin parameters
plugin_parameters.description: Parameters for the Peptide Library Check plugin.

fasta_file.description: FASTA file containing protein sequences to generate tryptic peptide library

file_path.description: Tab-separated or CSV file containing experimental peptide data

min_length.description: Minimum length of peptides to include in the library

miss_cleavage.description: Maximum number of missed cleavages to consider when generating tryptic peptides

peptide_column.description: Column containing peptide sequences to check
